description: n-th prime is a Fibonacci number reversed.
comments: The next reversed Fibonacci number which is a prime number is 940647607443258103531. The next term in the sequence would be the prime index for that prime. - _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 02 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _G. L. Honaker, Jr._
extensions: More terms could be obtained from A036971.
One additional term from _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 02 2009
